website_summaries.verdict: A large infusion water bottle with some nice extras.
pros: This 32-ounce bottle includes a full length infuser and sweat-proof insulated cover
Metal ring latch on the flip top keeps bottle 100% leakproof
cons: Some had some issues with the seal after a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle, I just got a bum
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it and it does infuse water well. I also love that it holds so much water. My problem with it is that the basket that holds the fruit is very difficult to screw into the top, as if the treads do not line up properly. I may have just gotten a faulty product. I did return it without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mahaffy

customer_reviews.title: I love it – it doesn’t sweat all over my desk ...
customer_reviews.text: I used my new infuser bottle today for the first time filled with lemon slices. I love it – it doesn’t sweat all over my desk (I am a teacher) and it makes it easy for me to know I have reached my water intake amount. I could never seem to get my water intake in before. I am crazy for this product and give it 5 stars for sure - worth every penny. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A Longino

customer_reviews.title: All around poor
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. Too big, too tall, can't get my hand around it. Not to mention when full of fruit and water, it's heavy.Then when you put the neoprene sleeve it's even harder to grip. It's a nice concept, but . . . Also, it should have a place for a straw. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: aflok

customer_reviews.title: Not great in the long run
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd bottle I own. They work wonderful in the beginning, but after a few months they develop mold and stain in the washer areas. I clean these thoroughly every evening but still some gunk has managed to work its way into the seal and the bottom of the infuser. I only use cucumbers and limes, so I'm not sure what has developed on the infuser. The band that holds the lid up also snapped, and they don't sell replacements. So the lid just flops around. If the company offered replacement parts, this would be a non-issue...but you have to buy a new bottle once the seals go bad or snap.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good water bottle but top faces wrong way and elastic band gets cut
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good seal, large volume, sturdy/rugged, top flips open nicely due to the elastic band Cons: since it has a single threaded top to screw on with it is stuck always facing the wrong direction when you hold it using the grips provided; there's a serious issue with the interaction between the elastic band and the top. Over time it seems that the band gets cut and eventually breaks. I tried replacing it with a rubber band and that worked for a while before it got cut too. I've tried to include pictures to show this.
customer_reviews.author: Ernilyn Lamppin

customer_reviews.title: Best Infuser Water Bottle I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle to replace another infuser water bottle with a different brand. I love this one so much! It's much bigger than my previous infuser water bottle, so I don't have to refill it as much. My favorite part about this bottle that others don't have is the sleeve that keeps the water cool and the fruit fresh. I also love the spout- it has a good water flow and is easy to drink from. Highly recommend to anyone who loves fruit infused water or is looking for a delicious was to get those 8 recommended cups of water a day.
customer_reviews.author: Emma's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Hydracy Fruit Infuser
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these, one for myself and one for my husband. So far, with very little use yet, I really like the. It took a bit more in the line of emails than I like to finish the order with the seller and had to ask twice to get the included e-book. The seller does not say in their ad that you only get the e-book if you join their club. I purchased the infuser bottles with the understanding that the 2-book was included and I do not like giving all of my info to a seller that I know nothing about.
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the bottle, but after using for a few days the inside part that the infuser screws onto is very difficult to get out of the bottle to wash. I will be looking for a different kind of infuser with easier access to the infuser filter. Other wise I like the bottle and the sleeve and the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carnemolla

customer_reviews.title: out of balance falls when empty
customer_reviews.text: this bottle just took its 14th trip from a shelf in the cupboard to roll around the kitchen floor. The product is VERY badly designed for balance.. it regularly falls... even with the 'sleeve' it doesn't keep cool for any amount of time and while the top seals well it also contributes to its tendency to tip over and roll around the floor. Don't bother putting a carabinor into the hook it pulls it over when 1/2 full if the top is not sealed it spill all over the place. Very badly engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this product. I think that buying two would work out better for me. I drink a full 32 Oz. Container every 2 hours, so having a second, already prepared in the fridge would be helpful. Also, I find mixing the fruit to be somewhat messy and time consuming, but the end result is worth it. I’ve only had this for a couple days, and have only tried it with frozen fruit. When I go to the store, I plan on trying fresh. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It is true to its colour and looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Product received quickly and on time. It was appropriately packaged with no breaks or dents. It is true to its colour and looks exactly like the picture. I love that it has to top latch to protect ur from opening on its own and spilling water. I haven't used it on any recipes yet but once I do I will update this post. It's also very simple and easy to use, Not complicated and love the fact that the inner filter goes so low.
customer_reviews.author: P876

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED AS A GIFT
customer_reviews.text: The bottle color is a vibrant orange. The sleeve is easy to wash and dries overnight. The only negative thing I can say is you REALLY need to make sure the lid and bottle threading are lined up along with the fruit holder. It must be COMPLETELY flush to the bottle or it will leak. Since my daughter likes ice in her water it became difficult to do. I purchase special ice trays for this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn-Marie

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bottles, one for myself and one for a cancer support group Christmas gift exchange. It is easy to use and easy to clean. There are only 3 parts and they fit together and separate easily. I am always trying to encourage myself to drink more water and just the process of preparing the water and having it readily available makes me likely to drink more. I have only had the bottle for a short time and don't know how it will hold up over the long term, but if seems sturdy and the company has a "limited lifetime guarantee". I am happy with this purchase and would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kizer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I drink water all the time, but sometimes i like to spice it up a bit :-) I really purchased this for my mom who rarely drinks water and then got one for myself. Its very well made. Lid secures well. Love the color i got. The sleeve is great if you like your water ice cold. I do cold or room temp. Seems like it would last a good while. There are others out there that cost much more. This one is great and at a great price and its 32 oz. the others are usually 24 oz. I wish i had seen the one for 50 oz. the brochure that came with this one mentions it. ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: TASHA H.

customer_reviews.title: The good and the bad
customer_reviews.text: I really like the whole idea of an infuser bottle. I would give it 5 stars except that it's a little large and bulky and heavy to carry. It doesn't fit in my cars cup holder or other cup holders. I don't know how that could be solved since the whole idea is to load the infuser part up with fruit. I transfer the fruit water to one of my other water bottles to take on the go. I think if I had known this before, I would have bought an infuser pitcher and just kept it in the refrigerator to pour into a glass, water bottle etc.
customer_reviews.author: BJI

customer_reviews.title: Spice up your water
customer_reviews.text: This is my first infuser water bottle. This product is a solid bottle & fits well in my hand. The cartridge for fruit, cinnamon, etc. is of a seemingly good quality plastic but I would not push too many fruit pieces into it for fear of breaking the cartridge. Assembly is easy as is the cleaning of this product. Recipes are available by digital download once you sign up for it. I have tried a few so far & they are okay. You have to play with the amounts for your specific tastes. I have been using this infuser everyday for a month now & it has helped me drink more water & try new combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Snogger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Spacious Infuser Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: You will down your water so fast with this bottle! I am having so much fun making new infusions everyday, definitely helping me to drink more water. The bottle is easy to clean and easy to load with fruit. The lock is secure and it does not leak--I turn it upside down every time I make a new infusion. The water gets nice and cool in the bottle and while the infuser does leak out some fruit, it adds to the experience for me! I am very satisfied with my purchase and I love the color! It makes me feel happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: The Sleeve does not go on all the way!
customer_reviews.text: I love the infuser bottle, but have to slice the bottom of the sleeve to put it all the way inside if I want to use it. The bottom of the sleeve is too narrow, pushed hard as I could to fit it in, will not go! I even broke a nail pushing it in! I'll have to do without it or slice it to make the bottle fit down into it all the way. I have the 32 oz size. The quality of the infuser itself is excellent and I know I'll enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Delicious!! Don’t hesitate to buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These fruit infusion cups are truly the best!!! I am a water drinker but this is the first time I tried fruit infused water and I can’t stop drinking it; so, so tasty!! The cups work amazingly great and hold the perfect ratio of fruit to water. I wouldn’t want a small size cup than this 32oz ! I purchase this book (pictured) with it and it’s petfect! So informative, helpful, and easy to read and follow receipts!! Purchase these two item together and you won’t be sorry :)) I bought both on Amazon !!
customer_reviews.author: R. Dove

customer_reviews.title: New lover of infused water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bottle for the beginning of a new passion for infused water, this container is perfect, it holds the fruit, it locks tight so no leaking. As for putting ice in, you cannot, but you can pour it over ice after you infuse overnight. Nice color, easy to hold and has e book and cover to keep it cold and so the sweat from the bottle doesn't get on anything! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H.

customer_reviews.title: Infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I truly dislike about this cup is the fact that I can't add as much as I'd like too. The infuser almost reaches the bottom of the bottle and the sides have only a narrow space for ice. This may not be an issue for some but I like my drinks cold. The sleeve doesnt make much of a difference for keeping the bottle that cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it started getting some dark spots like mold I would had to use a brush n ...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple uses lid broke off, very hard to clean, it started getting some dark spots like mold I would had to use a brush n bleach to get rid off them, got rid of the bottle😖
customer_reviews.author: SERGIO BRISENO

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY CAMPER
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and shipping, timing was perfect, and as promised the drinking containers are a wonderful product! Great idea too! I bought one plus three more for my daughters so they'd consume more water in a healthier way. I haven't had my chance yet to start actively using it, but my daughter is thrilled! She says she will fill the insert with fresh fruit and then place it in the freezer overnight and that way will be able to fit more fruit in the insert. She was LOVING the natural fruit flavor and is drinking water more than ever! I can't wait to give my other two daughters their new containers! By the way--The pink and green are FUN colors!
customer_reviews.author: SandyPaws

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lock feature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a heavy water drinker. I thought she might enjoy some fruit infused water, and it turns out I was right. She said she had tried infuser water bottles before, but gave up on them when the lock feature never worked right. She said this one is the best she used. I might even buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! I was just looking for a sturdy bottle to leave at the office because I am constantly dehydrated. This thing exceeded my expectations. I haven't used the infuser part because I'm lazy and haven't went grocery shopping but the bottle part is the bees knees. I've had it for about 2 weeks and my little metal anchor thing hasn't broken off. The sleeve is a little hard to get on but that's nothing compared to the annoyance of water bottle sweat getting on everything you love and care about.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the green one for myself and the purple for my daughter. We both love them! I’ve put lemons, strawberries, cucumbers, everything! And when you feel the water is flavored enough and don’t want it stronger, the middle comes out! So much better than just dropping the fruit inside the bottles like I have been doing with other products. The sleeve that comes with it has a durable handle so you can hang the bottle on your bike or machines at the gym when working out. This is a great way to get more water in to stay hydrated and love what you’re drinking at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, you can’t go wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bottle! This is my first infuser water bottle and I like so much the taste of my water now that I must be drinking easily twice as much as before. The bottle feels sturdy and of great quality. I like the fact that it’s easy to use and clean. The bottle is pretty large so you can put a lot of fruits and waters. I also love the flip top and the fact that the locking system is very safe so you don’t risk any leak. So far I have used it to go to the gym and office and every time received great compliments. Definitely recommends!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Specht

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Only used for a week but loving it. Bought two. Very little concerns. I do question, if I dropped it would it shatter. It looks and feels like a thin, brittle plastic. Also wonder about scratches but sleeve would cover them. Sleeve is kind of a pain to take on/off to clean. When I pull inside basket out, it is so tight that when it lets loose, I splatter what is left all over my shirt. It does serve the purpose
customer_reviews.author: woodsie8

customer_reviews.title: OK!
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes hers. I am concerned about how often the Fruit/vegetable is to be changed making sure what one drinks is safe. I also wish I had purchased one with a straw rather than having to open and close it all of the time. We purchased because a cousin was visiting and had this same brand. I do like the way it feels when holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not glass but will make a great regift item!
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I wish I had read the description better. This is plastic and I wanted glass. The sleeve that comes with it is cheap. Not sure what use it will serve. The cap has a lock on it that I find to be a pain because you can’t just flip it open with one hand. I’ll be regifting this thing.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Loving my Hydracy Infuser
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? I really like the capacity of the bottle and the fact that the infuser is inserted at the top and isn’t a screw-bottom. The infuser capacity is perfect and I’ve made 2 different infusions since receiving it. I will highly recommend this style and brand to my family and friends. Looking forward to downloading my free receipt e-book. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Faithfullyk

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love my InfuseFruit 32-oz water bottle. I ordered this as a replacement (the band that lets the cap top pop up when the button is pressed broke on the one I had and the company was wonderful - sent me a code for a new bottle for free). For some reason, every time I put one in my Amazon basket, the color became unavailable, so the last choice was for yellow, which worked. But I received the Tango Red one (which is really a bright orange) - the one I originally had! LOL I don't care about the color anyway, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was cute in the sunny yellow color. That is about the only good thing I can say. The insulated sleeve does little to keep it cold. It is hard to get on and off. The plastic bottle is very thin. And the button on the lid broke in the first couple of days. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Brown eyes

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I personally feel I wasted money. I’ve tried so many different fruits and never did get the water to a nice flavor. Ended up getting a slight plastic smell and taste. It’s super cute, just wasn’t worth the money spent in my opinion. Now, it’s going to a donation center so it doesn’t take up space in my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the plastic smell and taste in water
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. The shape allows easy grab 2. Fits in the cup holder in the car 3. Tight seal Cons: Bad plastic smell and taste in water. I am returning this because that smell/taste gives me bad headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle, it is gorgeous and works great as an infuser. I find it very easy to clean by hand, it really does take 2 minutes and even less. I love that it is really spill proof, I feel comfortable enough to put it in my handbeg lying down. I mostly use the bottle with sparkling water and the bottle handles it very well. I use the recipe book for infusion combinations and it is very detailed and delicious. I am considering buying one for my mother as a gift because, she is trying to reduce the amount of soft drinks that she consumes and I think this could be a great replacment for that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really motivated me to drink more water!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle! I have made so many fruit and veggie infusions! I love making cucumber lemon water! Pictured is strawberry lemon water. It really motivates me to drink more water throughout my workday and the sleeve helps it stay colder for longer. It's not as great at keeping cold as a yeti cup but it helps a lot. I love the color options too! The only thing is that I did not get the e-book of recipies that it advertised I would get. But, I was able to use it fine. I would definitely recommend this item as it really helps with increasing water intake!
customer_reviews.author: Sami Mahon-Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this hydration/infusion bottle
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of water and so thought I'd try an infusion bottle to add flavor to my drink. I love that the basket goes all the way to the bottom of the bottle, unlike some others on the market for the some price or more. Good quality. Easy to put together, even for someone who is all thumbs, and I love the jacket. I haven't downloaded the free recipe book yet but look forward to trying some new flavors to my otherwise boring water. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to drink fewer sugary soft drinks and add some healthy water to their diet.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. In Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and overall the size of the product is good but it leaked several times even after adjusting the top. I also found that after a few uses it seemed to have mold and since it can't be put in the dishwasher I have stopped using it as it doesn't appear to clean well.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as a fruit infuser. For me, this bottle has really helped me increase my water intake. Something about how the water flows makes me drink more but it doesn’t feel like a chore. (PS- I fully realize how ungrateful and privileged I sound, as there are people in this world who would give anything for clean water to drink...).
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen Husain

customer_reviews.title: Great leak proof
customer_reviews.text: Great leak proof. However, I think I don't have enough grip strength to put all together tightly. Rubber parts (there are 2 ring-shaped rubber band at its rim and inside of its cap) are thick, which is good, but I took a while to get the knack to close tightly. Also, rubber bands gets black spots (water scale?) if you don't take them out and wash them really well every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid55

customer_reviews.title: Be careful grows mold quickly
customer_reviews.text: It works as described however the top grows mold within a day . I don’t understand how this happens . I am assuming it’s poor plastics . I purchased one for daughter had I known within 12 hours mold would be growing I would never have purchased . I will call the company to replace
customer_reviews.author: lovelifealways

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold water
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait to start using this water infuser bottle ....went to wash it and there’s a hole in the bottom! Seriously? What kind of quality control does this company have??!! I am returning it and ordering a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: randy's opinion

customer_reviews.title: Wateraholic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought my first bottle and I dropped it on our tile floor. Made me sick, that I broke the lid so I contacted the company via email to see if they had replacement lids I could purchase, although no response. Since I love using my infuser so much I bought two more (i love the variety of colors)! We infuse with fresh Mint leaves and Cucumbers from our garden, and it's fabulous! I can drink in one days time, 96 +oz. Thank you Hydracy for great quality, cool colors and for the 'sleeve' to protect from sweating all over everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing water
customer_reviews.text: Have been infusing fruit from some of my 8 citrus trees and I really like the concept and result. As I suspected, the slight fruit taste from the infusion makes the water quite refreshing to drink, particularly when I'm at tennis, the gym, or out for a hike or run. So far I've just tried citrus fruits, plus cucumber slices and mint leaves. But I will soon infuse strawberries and other fruits as they come into season. I'm now also more inclined to bring a bottle of water with infused fruit to my desk to drink throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I thought it seemed a bit flimsy when it arrived but geeze I've only used it 3 times and the screw or pin holding the lid on is already coming out.
customer_reviews.author: jayz

customer_reviews.title: I'm too lazy to sum it up, so just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this item before, but by a different brand. That brand, like this brand, was great, but had a few minor flaws. This one fixes all those flaws. The main flaw with the previous one was, the infuser core didn't have a lip at the top whereas this one does. The lip makes it an effing breeze to screw on the lid. Another is, if the previous one fell over, it would leak. Not a lot, but still something to point out. This design is 150% leak-proof. Definitely worth 5-stars all-around. I highly recommend this one and will buy again in the future. Live long and prosper. 🖖🏼
customer_reviews.author: E. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: and I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue one, and I love it so far. I need to drink about 5 liters of water a day while pregnant, and this is nearly 1 liter, so I just have to fill it up five times and I'm good. However, that much water gets boring, so having the ability to add the health benefits of some fruit kills two birds with one stone! Plus, the company gives you recipes for water infusion, and that's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle it doesn't leak it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle it doesn't leak it has a large infuser to put fruit I'm Verry easy to use the only down fall from getting 5 stars is because I ordered a light blue and lime green one I got light blue and fuchsia contacted seller they were very quick with their response telling me that it wasn't them that shipped the product it was Amazon so I contacted Amazon even though they were saying sorry I really feel that I shouldn't of had to send my bottle back to get the color that I wanted neither side stepped up and made it right but it is still all good great product will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: jodi elmore

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$ these come dirty
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy, cheap plastic! It arrived with all kinds of black scuffs on the pretty blue & no matter how hard I scrubbed, I simply could not get them off! Too bad as it was a cool idea & pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug2107

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: A friend purchased this for me a while back and it immediately became my favorite water bottle. Thanks to my clumsy son, this bottle was dropped multiple times and the latch finally ended up breaking. I liked it so much, I went ahead and bought myself another one. The only disappointment is that my first bottle came with a sleeve that helped keep it insulated and this one did not. Still a great, leak-proof bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Henry M.

customer_reviews.title: With the infuser, cup tends to leak. But otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: Fairly happy with this purchase. The main complaint I have is that whenever the infused basket is inside, the rim tends to leak. I'm not sure if this is a malfunction of the seal or the basket. Either way, I do love using it I just have to use caution if drinking anything dark so as to not stain what I'm wearing! I have used the infused for teas, fruit, fruit juices, and plain water. It works well in the infusing part....just not so great with the seal. Without the infused in the cup everything works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amaca

customer_reviews.title: Missing the sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bottle a year ago as a Mother’s Day gift for my best friend and she loved it!! Unfortunately she broke it so she got an early Christmas gift but it was unfortunate that it wasn’t like the first bottle I purchased. I was missing the sleeve that covers the bottle and keeps it cool 😕
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & So Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and love them! Lemon & lime bits in the infuser are awesome! The sleeve really helps to keep the drink cold. Its a bit tricky to fill the bottle with ice & then get the infuser settled into it but worth the shaking & jiggling. Easy drinking ability. Fit well in my hiking belt & in my backpack. They are really easy to clean. So pretty. Best of all they hold enough water to keep me hydrated for a good hike. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: I’m drinking WAY more water! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle SO much! Before, I would drink MAYBE 16oz of water a day.... I’m just not a water drinker, and I hate forcing myself to try. But this bottle has been a life changer. The designers of this bottle thought of every little detail.... and mine doesn’t leak at all and is literally just amazing. I know drink up to 80oz a day and it’s so easy. Love the diffuser piece too. Makes my water so yummy with the fruit! I’m definitely buying another in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: RiRi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Flavored Water
customer_reviews.text: Let me say there is NOTHING that I DO NOT LIKE. I LOVE this bottle! It is easy to clean and the infuser is wide enough for apple and orange slices. I love the taste and flavor of whatever fruit, veggies or herbs I decide to put in my bottle. I will definitely purchase more a bottle for friends and family! Like why buy flavored water when you can make your own?
customer_reviews.author: Kamaney Cole

customer_reviews.title: Meets Advertised Expectations
customer_reviews.text: The Hydracy Fruid Infuser water bottle is easy to use and convenient to both hold and transport. It is my first purchase of such a product and I recommend it without reservation. The only adjustment that might be considered for the product is to make the infuser a little narrower so that ice cubes could be added to the liquid. The current diameter of the infuser makes it tough to use anything but crushed ice in the main part of the bottle. To work around that, I fill the infuser about halfway with fruit/vegetables and the rest of the way with ice ... which works OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband has doubled his water intake using this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is crazy about his new water bottle. He has used it non stop since receiving it. He makes great use of the infuser, adding all sorts of fruit and herbs. He has at least, doubled his water intake. Great design, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosierchic

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle I have gotten from them. I bought one last year around this time and I absolutely just love it. I work upstairs and have to go downstairs to get water so having a 30 oz water bottle cuts down on me going up and down the stairs all the time. The one I bought last year the rubber grip is starting to tear off pretty bad but I chalk it up to me using it every. single. day.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and it is nice and big. It doesn’t leak at all. At least not for me. I think those who are having leaking problems may not be putting the lid on properly. I definitely recommend this water infuser if you are looking for one. I will be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stay hydrated in Texas heat
customer_reviews.text: I have so enjoyed this bottle. Every aspect of the bottle is great. I am encouraged to drink more water, which I struggled with. The lock keeps it sealed. I love the fact it comes with a sleeve. This has given me a great idea for gifts as it has become a talk around work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Bottle Infuser I Have Found! Tried Several!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my cheer athlete daughter! She’s super trendy and loves new stuff! She adores plain water but loves fruit too and fused water is a new love of hers after trying it at a hotel a few years back. We’ve done it on large scale but this is awesome for her in the go! Great value and definitely worth the price. The insulation sleeve is PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephcaliese

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this product ,is easy to use and sturdy ,it really have made it easy for me to drink the amount of water that I need to drink daily ,before I was lucky if a drink two glasses a dayall this at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: These made great gifts!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these to give as gifts. Was amazed by all the color choices. This is a great way to add fresh natural flavors to your water. The added sleeve is a bonus. My friends loved receiving these. Super quick delivery and pricing was very good. Time to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: intodogs

customer_reviews.title: Poor Craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: I originally liked this water bottle but after a few weeks the bottle began to fall apart. The rubber seal inside of the top fell out and then the metal bar to used to secure the lid broke off. A friend of mine has the same bottle and she had the same issue. I will more than likely not repurchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barber

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it's very good
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it's very good. The lid had some problems in leaking, but the costumer service sent me a free one after just one month (regardless any policy) they are very good growing company and they treat me very well. I didn't enjoy the fruits in water, maybe its me, so eventually I removed the middle part and now just using it to encourage me drinking a lot of water everyday. I just put 4 starts because of the long term efficacy of the lid in leaking. But, it really leaked only when I did that on purpose and powerfully, not in my bag or something.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed E. Radwan

customer_reviews.title: I am in love! Yesterday I infused orange and ginger in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's only day 2 however, I am in love! Yesterday I infused orange and ginger in the infuser and re filled the bottle three times and the flavor was still there all day long. Today I am infusing strawberry and lemon. My impetus foe getting this is because I resist drinking enough water. This is a very simple solution which turns the "have to" into a "want to"---Its fun and it seems to be motivation to get the hydration my body and every"body" requires. I also appreciate that the company sent me two emails and helped me register for the e-recipe book. They seem invested in their customers which is a win win to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip18

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use but you need to be careful to take the gaskets off to lean them and under the so as not to get mold so you do not get sick. They are not that easy to get back on after you take them offf
customer_reviews.author: sweetpeawells

customer_reviews.title: Great infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great infuser bottle. Got it to replace another brand I had that broke. The previous brand had a straw built in, which was ok but I put it in the dishwasher and it cracked the mouthpiece. I prefer this bottle because there's no straw. It's sturdy plastic and I like that the infuser part goes all the way down the bottle. That way it keeps infusing even when your water is at a low level. Love the insulating sleeve too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best of many tried
customer_reviews.text: I bought quite a few infuser bottles to try out, but this one is by far the best. The long infuser tube gives plenty of room for fruit or veggies (I like cucumbers and lemons together) and the wide mouth is easiest to clean. Comes with an anti-sweat cover which is really nice, as I like my water super cold. Took a minute to figure out the spout release (a little metal keeper that flips down) and installation of the anti-sweat cover (I start with it mostly inside out and it goes on super easy.) Great bottle.
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl1550

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product in february and 2 months later ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in february and 2 months later started to spill water when I put it face down.
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: How do I LOVE IT? Let me count the ways!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Well made, 2. no funny taste or smell, 3. holds the perfect amount of fruit & 32 oz water, 4. sleeve prevents "sweating", 5. doesn't leak or spill, 6. the part you put your mouth on is covered/stays clean, 7. comfortable to hold (no bigger than a 32 oz cup), 8. SO EASY TO CLEAN...my hand fits inside to clean/dry & dishcloth fits into the opening you drink out of too! 9. the handy strap Makes carrying it EASY 10. It's PRETTY!! I've gotten many inquiries from coworkers who think its so neat!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my fruit infuser water bottle soon after ordering and was not disappointed. The quality is great, easy to clean and really works well. Added fruit to the water makes it more enjoyable to drink and since I have to drink alot due to kidney problems this will really help to encourage me to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Bought mainly for work. I love the size. I only have to refill twice. My i only minor issue is cleaning it. It says dishwasher safe but hand wash preferably. Because its a little pricey, I hand wash it.
customer_reviews.author: FYHDLG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic water bottle. Functional, and cute. Love the infuser and cover. I wish it held a little more but refilling it is easy enough as long as you have access to water! Great product. The ebook has some great ideas for the infuser. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vixen

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Water Bottles I’ve Owned
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best water bottles I’ve owned! It’s a nice size, can fit in the cup holder in your vehicle and the bright yellow color is awesome to look at. Both times I’ve infused my fruit, the taste was amazing! I am satisfied with my purchase and have persuaded others to purchase one as well.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: This infuser has met all expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This infuser has met all expectations. Although you can find less expensive versions, I spent the extra money because the infuser goes all the way to the bottom of the bottle and it has the outside sleeve. It was worth it! I have had the bottle for several days now and have noticed an increase in my water intake because water is now more enjoyable to drink (more often and in larger quantities). I have used fresh fruit and frozen. Both work well. The infuser has kept the frozen fruit from crumbling apart in my water. I am very pleased and highly recommend this product. I will purchase this again and use as birthday gifts for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle I spend hours looking for the perfect one for a good price and this is definitely it everything about it works great and it absolutely will not leak, the infuser works perfect or you can just take it out and the included slip is very nice too! The costumer device was above and beyond, I really couldn’t say enough good things about the bottle I’m buying my mom one for her birthday as well. Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Nikki brown

customer_reviews.title: Not drip proof at all
customer_reviews.text: This is not leak proof. The rubber inside the cap came tip. Does not stay in the grove of the cap. When you lift to drink water drips profusely. Not satisfied and would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Youcefi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I refill it three times a day. It is used all day longe with opening and closing the lid. This is my second infuser in 5 months . The lidsrubber hinge closer wore out . I bought a second one because every other feature is great.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great concept-poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for approx 40 days. Used every day without issue. a Few weeks ago, it began leaking from cover and it wasn't a big deal. Thought it was not tightly screwed on. Verified it was and continued to use it as it was a few drops, no big deal. Today the elastic band that pops the clear cover back broke. Officially a great idea/concept but poor quality and control. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: CMel

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle with infusion as a great extra.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is great. I never would have considered it for my self but my wife saw that I liked flavored waters and decided to give it a try. I tried it and it works great. The parts are all well made and solid. The finger ring has a nice curve to it, the lid has a metal latch, the bottle has nice gripping places and the rubber makes it so its hard to drop. All around its a great bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size water bottle 💧
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this water bottle! I'm not good at keeping up with my water intake throughout the workday but this helps A LOT. I just drink two of these a day-one before lunch and one after-and I know I've done well to keep hydrated. This is a great, easy to clean, truely spill-proof bottle. You even get the bonus fruit chamber if you're into that. I love this and bring it with me everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: r4

customer_reviews.title: Happy sipping
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy thinking up combo drinks like lemon and ginger and lime and mint. I sip on this refreshing water is this beautiful ly designed jug. I bought one for each of my daughters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I need a bottle bottle for water fruit infusion. I found this bottle and saw that it received good reviews. I love the fact that it came in different colors love the yellow. I received the bottle and loved it immediately it works well and does not leak. The only issue is the container that holds the fruit is hard to twist off sometimes other than it I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But this product yesterday but I love it it is my new favorite bottle to drink from I can put like pineapple or lemon in it and
customer_reviews.text: But this product yesterday but I love it it is my new favorite bottle to drink from I can put like pineapple or lemon in it and I'm ready to go and it's very tasty and I got one for my aunt for her birthday so I hope she likes it hers is green and mine is pink and I would highly recommend this product to anyone it's easy to use it's easy to clean and it's really fun
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Kovar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bottle! I wanted to wait until I had it awhile to give it an honest review. It doesn’t leak, is easy to clean and looks great. I really have been drinking more water since I got it and that was my plan!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to be able to infuse water with a wide ...
customer_reviews.text: The yellow color is bright and cheerful, and it is a very straightforward design. It is nice to be able to infuse water with a wide variety of fruits and herbs since the openings in the infuser are narrow enough that not many pieces of things filter into the water. There may be *some* pulp however, especially if you muddle the fruits and/or herbs before you add them (which I do recommend for maximum flavor). All parts are very easy to hand-wash. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Look at me:  Hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for three hours and already am in love with it. It's easy to assemble and disassemble, easy to drink, and has me drinking lots more water already. Because I like my water a little colder, I put a couple of ice cubes in the infuser, along with the fruit. Worked great! This was a very good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Southon

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service & E-book
customer_reviews.text: I love my hydracy bottle. I’ve had the bottle for more than a year now and have experimented with the recipes in the e-book. There are a good variety so it’s easy for me to find something with ingredients I have on hand. I did have an issue with the inner basket that I had to email them about about 6 months after my purchase. They immediately wrote me back and replaced the whole bottle. I haven’t had any issues since. My husband got one as well and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: The greatest thing is the size (32 oz) which really keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't had time to try that many recipes yet, but it seems to do exactly what it is suppose to do. I've tried herbal mint tea with fruit and it is different. The hardest part is conditioning your taste buds and body away from the artificial sweeteners that I'm use to drinking in my sports bottle. The greatest thing is the size (32 oz) which really keeps my body hydrated during workouts. The other thing is the cover which makes it easier to hold and keeps it cold. That is why I bought this one over competitive versions. I am not disappointed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: alcstein

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this infuser.
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for buying this infuser was to keep track of how much water per day I’m drinking. Being able to add a little flavor was a big plus. By the way, thanks for that tip on adding citrus. I left the skins on the lemons the first time I used it and found your comment to be true about bitterness. Will follow your recommendation next time. I’m very pleased with this product. The only time it leaked was when I didn’t have it screwed on correctly.
customer_reviews.author: GLS

customer_reviews.title: Do not carry it in your backpack it will leak ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not carry it in your backpack it will leak all over your books and papers. It came with a misshapen soft ring on the inside of the lid, but I think that was just to make sure you could open it. Ok. I just read a review that the ring is supposed to be there. CAME DAMAGED!!! Too much hassle to return. I'll use it as is, but won't be buying any for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this bottle except that it has leaked ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Unfortunately, the leaky top became such a problem that I no longer use it. Bummer! It had such great potential. Love everything about this bottle except that it has leaked a little from where the lid screws on. I think it may have to do with properly seating the fruit holder exactly in the middle of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying my new infusion water bottle. This is my first one so I don't have any experience to use in comparing it to others with the exception of what I read online when looking to purchase one. This one seems really great. I thought it was reasonably priced and works well. I haven't used the sweat proof cover since I've been drinking it straight out of the fridge and quickly inside my house. Maybe if I took it outside in the heat I might need it. Good quality bottle. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SukiB

customer_reviews.title: Love my water!
customer_reviews.text: I had read on some reviews that this leaked. Mine did at first but I quickly realized that the insert was not in straight. Not a problem since. When I received this the insulating sleeve was not included. I contacted the seller and they made it writes. A new bottle with a sleeve was sent. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. I love the size of the infuser it whole way more fruit than my previous infuser. I LOVE the insulated bag. Don't have to worry about a coaster when placing it on my desk at work. I love the carrying handle for when I am out taking a walk. My daughter saw mine and is placing an order to get her one. I give this product a 10 out of 10 and a big thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: NeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Actually enjoy drinking water now, because of this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. Love the fact that the infuser insert goes almost to bottom of the bottle, unlike the other bottles that the infuser goes down about half way. I'd have to fill the bottle up too much, and seemed to waste most of the fruits and vegetables I was trying to infuse. Will be getting more for family members! I recommend this product. Added bonus: you can download a free starting guide and recipe book, as well as enjoy a 15% discount coupon for future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Imtelllan

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. The only thing I would say could use improvement would be the ease of drinking. The lid seems to be just a bit too close to the face when using.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. I shopped around for a while before purchasing this one. I've used regular sport bottles and mason jars for my infused drinks and it's nice to have an infuser so not to drink and chew at the same time. The came with a link to an e-book of recipes and it really helps me get my daily water intake in. It's also especially useful when I'm doing a cleanse. My only negative, which is very small, is that I wish the infuser could hold more ingredients. Overall it's a great product, at a great price. It's easy to grip, fits in my cup holder, and so far it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wright

product_meta.title: Hydracy Fruit Infuser Water Bottle - 32 oz Sports Bottle - Time Marker & Full Length Infusion Rod + 27 Fruit Infused Water Recipes eBook Gift - Your Healthy Hydration Made Easy
feature_bullets: ✅ ENJOY DRINKING HEALTHY: large 32oz capacity and full length infuser basket for increased flavour till the last drop, drinking water has never been so tempting!

✅ DRINK MORE WATER: Thanks to our new timeline feature, you will easily track your daily water intake and adopt a healthy hydration habit proven to increase your energy level, facilitate weight loss, detox and feeling rejuvenated!

✅ SAFE & SIMPLE TO USE: Built with sturdy premium BPA free eco-friendly Eastman Tritan, your bottle can be used and reused safely by everyone adults or kids. The metal ring latch on the flip top ensures the bottle is securely sealed and 100% leakproof. Cleaned easily in 1 minute, spend more time experimenting with all the delicious recipes included in your free Starter Guide eBook.

✅ SMART & STYLISH DESIGN: easy to carry in backpack pocket or using extra convenient carry handle. Special fitted grips on both sides for a more comfortable and secure handling. Flip top Lid give you instant access to your infused water, large capacity reducing refilling needs, fits most car holders, 2-in-1 just remove the infuser and you have a nice sport bottle. Ideal for gift, why not buy another one for a friend or family member? Get ready to receive plenty of compliments!

★ YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED ★ We are so sure you will absolutely love your bottle that it comes with a lifetime satisfaction guaranteed: if for whatever reason you are not absolutely 100% thrilled by your infuser, we will refund or replace it, no question asked! Included also are instructions on how to download your free Infused Water Starter Guide & Recipes eBook. Kick-start your healthy habit and order your awesome bottle risk-free NOW!
